scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && deno fmt src
scripts.build: deno bundle --import-map ../../import_map.json --no-check --unstable src/diff.ts dist/diff.js && yarn min
scripts.min: deno fmt dist && yarn esbuild dist/diff.js --tree-shaking="ignore-annotations" --minify  --minify-identifiers --minify-syntax --outfile=dist/diff.min.js
